<a id="class_XRInterfaceExtension"></a>

# XRInterfaceExtension

**Inherits:** [XRInterface](class_xrinterface.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

Base class for XR interface extensions (plugins).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

External XR interface plugins should inherit from this class.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [XR documentation index](../tutorials/xr/index.md)

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_end_frame**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__end_frame)

Called if interface is active and queues have been submitted.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__get_anchor_detection_is_enabled"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **_get_anchor_detection_is_enabled**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__get_anchor_detection_is_enabled)

Return ``true`` if anchor detection is enabled for this interface.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__get_camera_feed_id"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](class_int.md) **_get_camera_feed_id**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__get_camera_feed_id)

Returns the camera feed ID for the [CameraFeed](class_camerafeed.md) registered with the [CameraServer](class_cameraserver.md) that should be presented as the background on an AR capable device (if applicable).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__get_camera_transform"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Transform3D](class_transform3d.md) **_get_camera_transform**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__get_camera_transform)

Returns the [Transform3D](class_transform3d.md) that positions the [XRCamera3D](class_xrcamera3d.md) in the world.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__get_capabilities"></a>

Returns the capabilities of this interface.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<!-- classref-method -->

[RID](class_rid.md) **_get_color_texture**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__get_color_texture)

Return color texture into which to render (if applicable).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

Return depth texture into which to render (if applicable).

<!-- classref-method -->

[StringName](class_stringname.md) **_get_name**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__get_name)

Returns the name of this interface.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__get_play_area"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[PackedVector3Array](class_packedvector3array.md) **_get_play_area**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__get_play_area)

Returns a [PackedVector3Array](class_packedvector3array.md) that represents the play areas boundaries (if applicable).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__get_play_area_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[PlayAreaMode](class_xrinterface.md#enum_XRInterface_PlayAreaMode) **_get_play_area_mode**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__get_play_area_mode)

Returns the play area mode that sets up our play area.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__get_projection_for_view"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[PackedFloat64Array](class_packedfloat64array.md) **_get_projection_for_view**\ (\ view\: [int](class_int.md), aspect\: [float](class_float.md), z_near\: [float](class_float.md), z_far\: [float](class_float.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__get_projection_for_view)

Returns the projection matrix for the given view as a [PackedFloat64Array](class_packedfloat64array.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__get_render_target_size"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Vector2](class_vector2.md) **_get_render_target_size**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__get_render_target_size)

Returns the size of our render target for this interface, this overrides the size of the [Viewport](class_viewport.md) marked as the xr viewport.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__get_suggested_pose_names"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[PackedStringArray](class_packedstringarray.md) **_get_suggested_pose_names**\ (\ tracker_name\: [StringName](class_stringname.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__get_suggested_pose_names)

Returns a [PackedStringArray](class_packedstringarray.md) with pose names configured by this interface. Note that user configuration can override this list.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__get_suggested_tracker_names"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[PackedStringArray](class_packedstringarray.md) **_get_suggested_tracker_names**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__get_suggested_tracker_names)

Returns a [PackedStringArray](class_packedstringarray.md) with tracker names configured by this interface. Note that user configuration can override this list.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__get_system_info"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

Returns a [Dictionary](class_dictionary.md) with system information related to this interface.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

Returns an [TrackingStatus](class_xrinterface.md#enum_XRInterface_TrackingStatus) specifying the current status of our tracking.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

Return velocity texture into which to render (if applicable).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__get_view_count"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](class_int.md) **_get_view_count**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__get_view_count)

Returns the number of views this interface requires, 1 for mono, 2 for stereoscopic.

<!-- classref-method -->

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **_initialize**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__initialize)

Initializes the interface, returns ``true`` on success.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__is_initialized"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **_is_initialized**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__is_initialized)

Returns ``true`` if this interface has been initialized.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__post_draw_viewport"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_post_draw_viewport**\ (\ render_target\: [RID](class_rid.md), screen_rect\: [Rect2](class_rect2.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__post_draw_viewport)

Called after the XR [Viewport](class_viewport.md) draw logic has completed.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__pre_draw_viewport"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **_pre_draw_viewport**\ (\ render_target\: [RID](class_rid.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__pre_draw_viewport)

Called if this is our primary **XRInterfaceExtension** before we start processing a [Viewport](class_viewport.md) for every active XR [Viewport](class_viewport.md), returns ``true`` if that viewport should be rendered. An XR interface may return ``false`` if the user has taken off their headset and we can pause rendering.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__pre_render"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_pre_render**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__pre_render)

Called if this **XRInterfaceExtension** is active before rendering starts. Most XR interfaces will sync tracking at this point in time.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__process"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_process**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__process)

Called if this **XRInterfaceExtension** is active before our physics and game process is called. Most XR interfaces will update its [XRPositionalTracker](class_xrpositionaltracker.md)\ s at this point in time.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__set_anchor_detection_is_enabled"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_set_anchor_detection_is_enabled**\ (\ enabled\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__set_anchor_detection_is_enabled)

Enables anchor detection on this interface if supported.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__set_play_area_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **_set_play_area_mode**\ (\ mode\: [PlayAreaMode](class_xrinterface.md#enum_XRInterface_PlayAreaMode)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__set_play_area_mode)

Set the play area mode for this interface.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__supports_play_area_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **_supports_play_area_mode**\ (\ mode\: [PlayAreaMode](class_xrinterface.md#enum_XRInterface_PlayAreaMode)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__supports_play_area_mode)

Returns ``true`` if this interface supports this play area mode.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__trigger_haptic_pulse"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_trigger_haptic_pulse**\ (\ action_name\: [String](class_string.md), tracker_name\: [StringName](class_stringname.md), frequency\: [float](class_float.md), amplitude\: [float](class_float.md), duration_sec\: [float](class_float.md), delay_sec\: [float](class_float.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__trigger_haptic_pulse)

Triggers a haptic pulse to be emitted on the specified tracker.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_uninitialize**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_XRInterfaceExtension_private_method__uninitialize)

Uninitialize the interface.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_XRInterfaceExtension_method_add_blit"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_blit**\ (\ render_target\: [RID](class_rid.md), src_rect\: [Rect2](class_rect2.md), dst_rect\: [Rect2i](class_rect2i.md), use_layer\: [bool](class_bool.md), layer\: [int](class_int.md), apply_lens_distortion\: [bool](class_bool.md), eye_center\: [Vector2](class_vector2.md), k1\: [float](class_float.md), k2\: [float](class_float.md), upscale\: [float](class_float.md), aspect_ratio\: [float](class_float.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_XRInterfaceExtension_method_add_blit)

Blits our render results to screen optionally applying lens distortion. This can only be called while processing ``_commit_views``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_XRInterfaceExtension_method_get_render_target_texture"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[RID](class_rid.md) **get_render_target_texture**\ (\ render_target\: [RID](class_rid.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_XRInterfaceExtension_method_get_render_target_texture)

Returns a valid [RID](class_rid.md) for a texture to which we should render the current frame if supported by the interface.
